name: cash-flow-forecasting
description: Predictive cash flow forecasting and financial projection tools
author: Claude Code

tasks.name: Build Predictive Cash Flow Model
tasks.prompt:
Implement predictive cash flow forecasting:

1. Enhance existing forecast logic in src/components/dashboard/cash-flow-chart.tsx
2. Build prediction model in src/lib/cash-flow-predictor.ts
3. Implement:
   - Historical trend analysis
   - Seasonal pattern detection
   - Recurring transaction predictions
   - Income projection
4. Add confidence intervals
5. Create 30/60/90 day forecasts
6. Visualize predictions with uncertainty bands

tasks.name: Scenario Planning Tool
tasks.description: What-if scenario analysis for financial planning
tasks.prompt:
Create scenario planning feature:

1. Build scenario engine in src/lib/scenario-planner.ts
2. Allow users to model:
   - Income changes
   - Major purchases
   - Debt payoff scenarios
   - Savings goal impacts
3. Create interactive scenario builder UI
4. Show side-by-side comparisons
5. Add scenario saving and sharing
6. Integrate with goal planning

tasks.name: Financial Health Scoring
tasks.description: Calculate and track financial health metrics
tasks.prompt:
Implement financial health scoring:

1. Create scoring system in src/lib/financial-health.ts
2. Calculate metrics:
   - Emergency fund coverage
   - Debt-to-income ratio
   - Savings rate
   - Budget adherence
   - Net worth trend
3. Generate overall health score (0-100)
4. Create health dashboard widget
5. Provide improvement recommendations
6. Track score over time
